summary: This document contains detailed financial records and customer interactions related to Jeffrey Epstein and his business dealings with FedEx. It includes invoice details, shipping records, and customer comments spanning several years, highlighting Epstein's shipping activities and financial transactions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E Epstein is mentioned multiple times as a customer of FedEx, with detailed records of his shipping activities and financial transactions.

persons.name: Tracey L. Ferrara
persons.context: Tracey L. Ferrara is identified as the custodian of records for FedEx, certifying the authenticity of the documents provided in response to a subpoena.

persons.name: Bella Tsukeman
persons.context: Bella Tsukeman is mentioned as a contact associated with NYSG LLC, involved in discussions regarding account management.

connections.description: Tracey L. Ferrara, as a representative of FedEx, manages the shipping and financial records for Jeffrey E Epstein.
Bella Tsukeman is noted as a contact for NYSG LLC, which is associated with Jeffrey E Epstein.

events.title: Subpoena Response
events.description: FedEx submitted a response to a subpoena, providing invoices and an Excel spreadsheet of business records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document includes multiple references to Jeffrey E Epstein's shipping activities with FedEx over several years.
Tracey L. Ferrara certifies the authenticity of the records provided in response to a subpoena.
Bella Tsukeman is mentioned as a contact related to NYSG LLC, which is associated with Epstein.
